attributes.action: Give 16 and 17 year olds a vote to stay in or leave the EU.
attributes.additional_details: I'm shocked about the referendum vote to leave the EU. I'm not convinced people have made a truly informed decision. My biggest concern is for the future of our children and young people. As a mother of a 13 and 17 year old who are both able to make their own decisions and want to influence their own futures, I feel obliged to ask the people to support this petition. Thank you. Louize Petch
attributes.background:
In 2014, there were 1,534,192 16- and 17-year-olds in the UK. 
Give them the right to vote on their own future.
